title: Voice UPI Alert (Web Prototype on Internet Computer) — UI, parsing, TTS, and Buy Me a Coffee

requirements.text: Implement a simple, modern home screen UI for “Voice UPI Alert” with: (1) total money received today, (2) last 5 transactions list, (3) a large Voice ON/OFF toggle, (4) dark mode support, and (5) large readable typography.

quotes:
UI (SUPER SIMPLE & MODERN)
- Home screen:
  • Total money received today
  • Last 5 transactions list
- Big toggle button:
  • Voice ON / OFF
- Dark mode support
- Large readable fonts

acceptanceCriteria: Home screen shows “Total received today” and a list of exactly the 5 most recent transactions (or fewer if <5).
A prominent toggle switches Voice ON/OFF and the UI reflects the current state.
Dark mode can be enabled and all text remains readable with sufficient contrast.
Typography is visibly large and consistent across the app.

requirements.text: Add a permissions/explanation-style screen (web-appropriate) that clearly explains what would be needed for SMS and notification detection on Android, and that this web build cannot request SMS/notification access; require the user to acknowledge before proceeding to the home screen.

quotes: Show permission explanation screen before enabling SMS & notification access.

acceptanceCriteria: On first load, users see an explanation screen before they can access the home screen.
The explanation text is in English and explicitly states SMS/notification reading is not available in the web app build.
After acknowledgment, users are routed to the home screen; acknowledgment persists across reloads.

requirements.text: Implement transaction capture via manual input (paste/import text) and offline parsing logic to detect *credit* transactions and extract: amount in INR, sender name (when available), date/time (when available), and source label (e.g., “GPay”, “PhonePe”, “Paytm”, “Amazon Pay”, “Bank SMS”) based on heuristics; store parsed transactions locally in the app state.

quotes:
PAYMENT DETECTION
- Detect credit transactions only.
- Correctly extract:
  • Amount (₹)
  • Sender name (if available)
  • Date & time
  • App name (GPay / PhonePe / Bank SMS)

Generate:
- Sample regex for detecting ₹ amounts

acceptanceCriteria: Users can paste a message/notification text and submit it to create a transaction entry.
Only messages classified as “credit/success” create transactions; debits/failures are ignored.
Each created transaction includes amount (number), source label, and a timestamp (fallback to current time if none can be parsed).
Provide (in code comments or a small “Parsing help” UI section) sample regex patterns for INR amount detection that match forms like “₹200”, “Rs. 200.00”, and “INR 1,250”.

requirements.text: Implement voice announcement using browser-native Text-To-Speech (SpeechSynthesis) when a new credit transaction is added and Voice is ON, with an English announcement like: “Money credited. Rupees 200 received in your account.” Provide a way to test the voice output from the UI.

quotes:
VOICE ANNOUNCEMENT
- Automatically speak when money is credited.
- Example voice:
  “Money credited. Rupees 200 received in your account.”
- Use Android Text-To-Speech (TTS) only (FREE).

acceptanceCriteria: When Voice is ON, adding a new transaction triggers a spoken announcement.
When Voice is OFF, no speech occurs.
A UI control exists to play a test announcement without adding a transaction.
All user-facing text for the announcement and controls is in English.

requirements.text: Add a “Buy Me a Coffee ☕” button at the bottom of the home screen that opens a UPI payment intent URL using the provided UPI ID: taranseetharaman273@oksbi.

quotes:
Add a “Buy Me a Coffee ☕” button.
- Opens UPI intent with my UPI ID.
...
my upi id taranseetharaman273@oksbi to payment,app must be ready to run ... then show in down its self buy me a coffee

acceptanceCriteria: Home screen shows a “Buy Me a Coffee ☕” button fixed at the bottom or clearly placed at the bottom of the content.
Clicking the button opens a UPI intent/payment link containing the UPI ID taranseetharaman273@oksbi.
No ads and no login prompts are introduced.

requirements.text: Create a coherent, clean visual theme (not blue/purple) and apply it consistently across the app (layout, spacing, typography, component styling) while keeping the UI minimal and modern.

quotes: Create an Android app (FREE, no paid SDKs) with a clean modern UI.

acceptanceCriteria: A single cohesive theme is used across all screens.
Theme avoids a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly necessary for contrast/accessibility.
UI remains simple, modern, and uncluttered.

constraints: Must use the existing Caffeine Internet Computer template stack (React + TypeScript + Tailwind + React Query; Motoko single-actor backend).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any path listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

This project cannot produce a native Android APK; Android SMS/notification permissions, notification listeners, background services, and Android Text-To-Speech APIs are not available in this web/IC environment.
All processing must remain offline in the client for this prototype (no uploading user message content to any server).
Use English for any user-facing text.
Preserve the provided UPI ID exactly: taranseetharaman273@oksbi.
nonGoals: Native Android implementation (Android Studio project, APK build, Android 10+ device services).
Reading real SMS inbox, receiving SMS broadcasts, or using a NotificationListenerService.
Guaranteeing voice announcements when the device screen is off (web apps cannot reliably run/speak in the background).
Using Firebase or any paid SDKs/APIs.

required: Minimal app icon with a microphone and rupee symbol in a clean monochrome style (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Simple wordmark logo reading “Voice UPI Alert” in a modern sans-serif style (logo.dim_1200x300.png)
